sentences.en: Arboreal marsupials may not recover to pre - logging densities.
sentences.cn: 树袋动物的密度可能无法恢复到伐木以前了.

sentences.en: Human vision like that of other pr mates has evolved in an arboreal environment.
sentences.cn: 人类的视觉,和其它灵长目动物的一样,是在丛林环境中进化出来的.

sentences.en: Koala is an arboreal Australian marsupial.
sentences.cn: 考拉是一种澳大利亚树栖有袋动物。

sentences.en: Man was evolved from an ancestor that was probably arboreal.
sentences.cn: 人大概是从住在树上的祖先进化而来的.

sentences.en: Monkeys live in an arboreal habitat.
sentences.cn: 猴子生活在树上的栖息地.
松鼠是栖于树上的动物.

sentences.en: Were the first flyers arboreal creatures that initially glided from tree tops to the ground?
sentences.cn: 最初的飞行动物是首先从树梢滑翔到地面的树栖动物 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 树木的；树木繁茂的；树木状的
树木茂盛的；树木的（等于arboreous）
植物园；（供科研等的）树木园
树木栽培家；树木研究者；树艺家

trans.tran_en: relating to trees, or living in trees
